string-array.name: add_ons_quantity_selector_stepper_developer_notes
string-array.item: When enabled, quantity selector will be displayed.
When disabled, quantity selector will be hidden.

string-array.name: book_google_pay_feature_description_developer_notes
string-array.item: When enabled, the Google Pay option will be displayed in booking flow.
When disabled, the Google Pay option will be hidden in booking flow.

string-array.name: book_points_rates_taxes_messaging_developer_notes
string-array.item: When enabled, the taxes messaging for points rates will be shown.
When disabled, the taxes messaging for points rates will be hidden.

string-array.name: dci_show_free_available_rooms_description_developer_notes
string-array.item: When enabled, the Pick a Building and Pick a Floor screens will use the Show Free Available Rooms Flow.

string-array.name: dci_vmsdk_floor_plan_description_developer_notes
string-array.item: If the toggle is on, DCI uses VMSDK logic.
If the toggle is off, DCI runs like it always has.

string-array.name: feature_description_developer_notes_digital_key_audio_feedback
string-array.item: If this feature is toggled on or off, the app must be restarted for the changes to take effect.
Currently only used for private doors on unlock success

string-array.name: feature_description_developer_notes_digital_key_beacon_logging
string-array.item: Restart app once the above value is updated to allow TRFramework to re-initialize.

string-array.name: feature_description_developer_notes_use_lock_framework
string-array.item: If this feature is toggled on or off, the app must be restarted for the changes to take effect.

string-array.name: global_references_localization_dev_notes
string-array.item: Provides capability to consume localized content from global preferences.

string-array.name: global_references_refactor_dev_notes
string-array.item: An overhaul of global preferences that allows consumption of a JSONObject instead of strongly typed classes.
Required to consume any properties added to global preferences added after this refactor.

string-array.name: honors_meter_suppression_dev_notes
string-array.item: When enabled the Honors Meter will be hidden, when disabled it will be visible
Removed dependency on Core+ for this toggle

string-array.name: lokion_floor_plan_description_developer_notes
string-array.item: if enabled, user can view the new floor plan using VMSDK also called Lokion Floor plan

string-array.name: m3_account_tab_feature_dev_notes
string-array.item: When enabled the account tab will display the M3 account screen
When disabled the account tab will display the M2 account screen

string-array.name: m3_help_feature_description_developer_notes
string-array.item: Our objective is to introduce a guided contact/customer support experience in the app, so that we can:
Help guests find the answers and actions they need help with easily
Include a bot first approach to answer quick questions and help guests with easy self-service tasks
Provide a seamless contact experience to chat or voice agents based on customer issues

string-array.name: qualtrics_enablement_dev_notes
string-array.item: When enabled the Qualtrics SDK features will be enabled
When disabled the Qualtrics SDK features will be disabled

string-array.name: res_form_cancellation_messaging_developer_notes
string-array.item: When enabled, displays the cancellation messaging in the M2 reservation form
When disabled, hides the cancellation messaging in the M2 reservation form

string-array.name: shopfeature_add_ons_description_developer_notes
string-array.item: When enabled, users will see an option to select add-ons for certain hotels in the booking flow
When disabled, add-ons will not be shown in the booking flow

string-array.name: shopfeature_confirmed_connecting_rooms_description_developer_notes
string-array.item: When enabled, the user will be able to filter by adjoining rooms when choosing an available room in a multi-room booking.
When disabled, the connecting rooms filter should not show and only non-connecting rooms should show as available rooms

string-array.name: shopfeature_dateless_description_developer_notes
string-array.item: When enabled, the user will be able to use Dateless in the M3 Shop & Book flow.

string-array.name: shopfeature_fee_transparency_feature_description_developer_notes
string-array.item: When enabled, users will see the updated UI displaying service charges for each rate and disclosure text
When disabled, users will not see disclosure text and service charges will not be under each rate

string-array.name: shopfeature_google_pay_developer_notes
string-array.item: When enabled, Google Pay will be an available payment option for certain properties.
When disabled, Google Pay will be hidden.

string-array.name: shopfeature_hilton_for_business_developer_notes
string-array.item: When enabled, the user will be able to switch from personal to business profiles and shop and book with business rates in the M3 Shop & Book flow.
When disabled, the Hilton for Business toggle will be hidden and users will not be able to see business rates

string-array.name: shopfeature_honors_one_click_enrollment_feature_description_developer_notes
string-array.item: When enabled, one click enrollment appears on booking summary for unauthenticated users
When disabled, one click enrollment will not appear on booking summary for unauthenticated users

string-array.name: shopfeature_honors_rate_room_login_feature_description_developer_notes
string-array.item: When enabled, honors rate room selection will prompt a login dialog for unauthenticated users
When disabled, honors rate room selection will not prompt a login dialog for unauthenticated users

string-array.name: shopfeature_login_and_enrollment_description_developer_notes
string-array.item: When enabled, the user can access the M3 Login and Enrollment screens.
When disabled, users will only have access to the M2 Login and Enrollment screens

string-array.name: shopfeature_m3_arabic_language_support_developer_notes
string-array.item: When enabled, the Home Screen Redesign will be displayed in Arabic.
When disabled, the Home Screen Redesign will be displayed in English.

string-array.name: shopfeature_points_and_money_description_developer_notes
string-array.item: When enabled, the user will be able to use Points & Money in the M3 Shop & Book flow.

string-array.name: shopfeature_points_rates_taxes_messaging_developer_notes
string-array.item: When enabled, the taxes messaging for points rates will be shown.
When disabled, the taxes messaging for points rates will be hidden.

string-array.name: shopfeature_res_summary_query_migration_description_developer_notes
string-array.item: When enabled, calls for the fetching reservation forms and creating reservations will use legacy data
When disabled, calls for the fetching reservation forms and creating reservations will use shop-feature classes

string-array.name: shopfeature_sb_mapview_feature_description_developer_notes
string-array.item: When enabled, tabs inside the Search Results in M3 should show for both List and Map View.
Selecting the Map Tab will navigate to the Map View.
When disabled, only the ListView for Search Results should show - tabs should not be visible or interactive.

string-array.name: shopfeature_sb_onelink_feature_description_developer_notes
string-array.item: When enabled, translations will be requested from OneLink service.
When default or disabled, OneLink implementation will be ignored.

string-array.name: shopfeature_sb_search_results_availability_filter_description_developer_notes
string-array.item: When enabled, the filter chip row found on the search results screen will have a new chip labeled \"More\"
Selecting the \"More\" chip will open a modal bottom sheet which will display the availability filter
When disabled, the \"More\" chip will not be found on the search results screen

string-array.name: shopfeature_sb_search_results_favorite_hotels_description_developer_notes
string-array.item: When enabled and logged in, the search results list view cards will have a heart icon
"Tapping on the heart icon will add the hotel to the user's favorite hotel list"
Filtering by favorite hotel will be available in the \"More Filters\" sheet

string-array.name: shopfeature_special_rates_a11y
string-array.item: AAA rate. ID required at check-in
AARP rate. ID required at check-in
Senior rate. ID required at check-in
Government/military rate. ID required at check-in
